channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Tyler, the Creator ‘Just Wanted to Be Silly Again’ on ‘Don’t Tap the Glass’
item.description: 🚀 Tyler, the Creator brings the silliness in 'Don't Tap the Glass'! 🐠 Let's dive into this playful new track together! 🎵 #TylerTheCreator #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Primus Parties At L.A. Show With Tool Members, Matt Stone
item.description: 🎉 Primus + Tool Members + Matt Stone = Epic LA Show Shenanigans! 🤘🎸 #RockOn

item.title: Prince’s ‘Sign O’ The Times’ concert film getting IMAX theatrical rerelease
item.description: 🎤 Prince fans, get ready for a larger-than-life experience! ‘Sign O’ The Times’ concert film is hitting IMAX screens soon! 🎸 #Prince #IMAXresurrection

item.title: Mariah Carey Just Found Out Katy Perry Went to Space: “That’s Pretty Amazing”
item.description: 🚀 Mariah Carey's reaction to Katy Perry's space trip is giving us life! 🌟✨ #CelestialDivas #PopQueens

item.title: No Joy asks bugs about their favorite albums
item.description: "Bug-approved tunes coming your way! 🐞🎶 No Joy gets the inside scoop on favorite albums! #MusicNews #RockinWithInsects"
